trans-unit.source: The current test framework does not implement 'IGracefulStopTestExecutionCapability' which is required for '--maximum-failed-tests' feature.
trans-unit.target: The current test framework does not implement 'IGracefulStopTestExecutionCapability' which is required for '--maximum-failed-tests' feature.

trans-unit.source: Extension used to support '--maximum-failed-tests'. When a given failures threshold is reached, the test run will be aborted.
trans-unit.target: 用來支援 『--maximum-failed-tests』 的延伸模組。達到指定的失敗閾值時，測試回合將會中止。

trans-unit.source: Aborted
trans-unit.target: 已中止

trans-unit.source: Actual
trans-unit.target: 實際

trans-unit.source: canceled
trans-unit.target: 已取消

trans-unit.source: Canceling the test session...
trans-unit.target: 正在取消測試工作階段...

trans-unit.source: Failed to create a test execution filter
trans-unit.target: 無法建立測試執行篩選條件

trans-unit.source: Failed to create a unique log file after 3 seconds. Lastly tried file name is '{0}'.
trans-unit.target: 3 秒後無法建立唯一記錄檔。上次嘗試的檔案名稱為 '{0}'。

trans-unit.source: Cannot remove environment variables at this stage
trans-unit.target: 在此階段無法移除環境變數

trans-unit.target: 延伸模組 '{0}' 嘗試移除環境變數 '{1}'，但其已被延伸模組 '{2}' 封鎖

trans-unit.target: 無法啟動流程 '{0}'

trans-unit.target: 選項 '--{0}' 有無效的引數 {1}

trans-unit.target: 無效的 arity，最大值必須大於最小值

trans-unit.target: 提供者 '{0}' (UID: {1}) 的設定無效。錯誤: {2}

trans-unit.target: 已通過

trans-unit.source: Specify the hostname of the client.
trans-unit.target: 指定用戶端的主機名稱。

trans-unit.source: Specify the port of the client.
trans-unit.target: 指定用戶端的連接埠。

trans-unit.source: Specifies a testconfig.json file.
trans-unit.target: 指定 testconfig.json 檔案。

trans-unit.source: Force the built-in file logger to write the log synchronously. Useful for scenario where you don't want to lose any log (i.e. in case of crash). Note that this is slowing down the test execution.
trans-unit.target: 強制內建檔案記錄器以同步方式寫入記錄。 適用於不想遺失任何記錄的案例 (例如損毀)。 請注意，這會減慢測試執行的速度。

trans-unit.source: Enable the diagnostic logging. The default log level is 'Trace'. The file will be written in the output directory with the name log_[yyMMddHHmmssfff].diag
trans-unit.target: 啟用診斷記錄。預設記錄層級為 'Trace'。 檔案將以 log_[yyMMddHHmmssfff].diag 名稱寫入輸出目錄中

trans-unit.source: '--diagnostic-verbosity' expects a single level argument ('Trace', 'Debug', 'Information', 'Warning', 'Error', or 'Critical')
trans-unit.target: '--diagnostic-verbosity' 需要單一層級引數 ('Trace'、'Debug'、'Information'、'Warning'、'Error' 或 'Critical')

trans-unit.source: '--{0}' requires '--diagnostic' to be provided
trans-unit.target: '--{0}' 要求必須提供 '--diagnostic'

trans-unit.source: Output directory of the diagnostic logging. If not specified the file will be generated inside the default 'TestResults' directory.
trans-unit.target: 診斷記錄的輸出目錄。 若未指定，則會在預設的 'TestResults' 目錄內產生檔案。

trans-unit.source: Prefix for the log file name that will replace '[log]_.'
trans-unit.target: 將取代 '[log]_' 的記錄檔名稱前置詞

trans-unit.source: Define the level of the verbosity for the --diagnostic. The available values are 'Trace', 'Debug', 'Information', 'Warning', 'Error', and 'Critical'.
trans-unit.target: 定義 --diagnostic 的詳細程度層級。 可用的值為 'Trace'、'Debug'、'Information'、'Warning'、'Error' 和 'Critical'。

trans-unit.source: List available tests.
trans-unit.target: 列出可用的測試。

trans-unit.source: dotnet test pipe.
trans-unit.target: dotnet 測試管道。

trans-unit.source: Invalid PID '{0}' {1}
trans-unit.target: 無效的 PID '{0}' {1}

trans-unit.source: Exit the test process if dependent process exits. PID must be provided.
trans-unit.target: 如果相依流程結束，則結束測試流程。必須提供 PID。

trans-unit.source: '--{0}' expects a single int PID argument
trans-unit.target: '--{0}' 需要單一 int PID 引數

trans-unit.source: Show the command line help.
trans-unit.target: 顯示命令列說明。

trans-unit.source: Do not report non successful exit value for specific exit codes (e.g. '--ignore-exit-code 8;9' ignore exit code 8 and 9 and will return 0 in these case)
trans-unit.target: 不要報告特定結束代碼的未成功結束 (例如 '--ignore-exit-code 8;9' 忽略離開代碼 8 和 9，在這些情況下會返回 0)

trans-unit.source: Display .NET test application information.
trans-unit.target: 顯示 .NET 測試應用程式資訊。

trans-unit.source: Specifies a maximum number of test failures that, when exceeded, will abort the test run.
trans-unit.target: 指定超過此數目時，測試失敗次數上限會中止測試回合。

trans-unit.source: '--list-tests' and '--minimum-expected-tests' are incompatible options
trans-unit.target: '--list-tests' 和 '--minimum-expected-tests' 是不相容的選項

trans-unit.source: Specifies the minimum number of tests that are expected to run.
trans-unit.target: 指定預期執行的測試數目下限。

trans-unit.source: '--minimum-expected-tests' expects a single non-zero positive integer value (e.g. '--minimum-expected-tests 10')
trans-unit.target: '--minimum-expected-tests' 需要單一非零的正整數值 (例如 '--minimum-expected-tests 10')

trans-unit.source: Do not display the startup banner, the copyright message or the telemetry banner.
trans-unit.target: 不要顯示啟動橫幅、著作權訊息或遙測橫幅。

trans-unit.source: Specify the port of the server.
trans-unit.target: 指定伺服器的連接埠。

trans-unit.source: '--{0}' expects a single valid port as argument
trans-unit.target: '--{0}' 需要單一有效的連接埠做為引數

trans-unit.source: Microsoft Testing Platform command line provider
trans-unit.target: Microsoft Testing Platform 命令列提供者

trans-unit.source: Platform command line provider
trans-unit.target: 平台命令列提供者

trans-unit.source: The directory where the test results are going to be placed. If the specified directory doesn't exist, it's created. The default is TestResults in the directory that contains the test application.
trans-unit.target: 將放置測試結果的目錄。 如果指定的目錄不存在，系統會建立該目錄。 預設值是包含測試應用程式之目錄中的 TestResults。

trans-unit.source: Enable the server mode.
trans-unit.target: 啟用伺服器模式。

trans-unit.source: For testing purposes
trans-unit.target: 測試用

trans-unit.source: Eventual parent test host controller PID.
trans-unit.target: 最終父測試主機控制器 PID。

trans-unit.source: 'timeout' option should have one argument as string in the format <value>[h|m|s] where 'value' is float
trans-unit.target: 'timeout' 選項應該有一個引數作為字串，格式為 <value>[h|m|s]，其中 'value' 為 float

trans-unit.source: A global test execution timeout. Takes one argument as string in the format <value>[h|m|s] where 'value' is float.
trans-unit.target: 全域測試執行逾時。 將一個引數作為字串，格式為 <value>[h|m|s]，其中 'value' 為 float。

trans-unit.target: 橋接至 VSTest API

trans-unit.source:
Telemetry --------- Microsoft Testing Platform collects usage data in order to help us improve your experience. The data is collected by Microsoft and are not shared with anyone. You can opt-out of telemetry by setting the TESTINGPLATFORM_TELEMETRY_OPTOUT or DOTNET_CLI_TELEMETRY_OPTOUT environment variable to '1' or 'true' using your favorite shell.
Read more about Microsoft Testing Platform telemetry: https://aka.ms/testingplatform/telemetry
trans-unit.target:
遙測 --------- Microsoft 測試平台會收集使用量資料，以協助我們改善您的體驗。資料由 Microsoft 收集，且不會與任何人共用。 您可以使用您喜愛的殼層，將 TESTINGPLATFORM_TELEMETRY_OPTOUT 或 DOTNET_CLI_TELEMETRY_OPTOUT 環境變數設定為 '1' 或 'true'，以選擇退出遙測。
閱讀更多關於 Microsoft 測試平台遙測: https://aka.ms/testingplatform/telemetry

trans-unit.source: Telemetry provider is already set
trans-unit.target: 遙測提供者已設定

trans-unit.source: Disable outputting ANSI escape characters to screen.
trans-unit.target: 停用將 ANSI 逸出字元輸出至螢幕。

trans-unit.source: Disable reporting progress to screen.
trans-unit.target: 停用向螢幕報告進度。

trans-unit.source: Output verbosity when reporting tests. Valid values are 'Normal', 'Detailed'. Default is 'Normal'.
trans-unit.target: 報告測試時的輸出詳細程度。 有效值為 'Normal'、'Detailed'。預設為 'Normal'。

trans-unit.source: --output expects a single parameter with value 'Normal' or 'Detailed'.
trans-unit.target: --輸出需要值為 'Normal' 或 'Detailed' 的單一參數。

trans-unit.source: Writes test results to terminal.
trans-unit.target: 將測試結果寫入終端機。

trans-unit.source: Terminal test reporter
trans-unit.target: 終端機測試報告者

trans-unit.source: An 'ITestFrameworkInvoker' factory is already set
trans-unit.target: 已設定 'ITestFrameworkInvoker' 中心

trans-unit.source: The application has already been built
trans-unit.target: 已建置應用程式

trans-unit.source: The test framework adapter factory has already been registered
trans-unit.target: 測試架構介面卡中心已註冊

trans-unit.source: The test framework capabilities factory has already been registered
trans-unit.target: 已註冊測試架構功能中心

trans-unit.source: The test framework adapter has not been registered. Use 'ITestApplicationBuilder.RegisterTestFramework' to register it
trans-unit.target: 尚未註冊測試架構配接器。使用 'ITestApplicationBuilder.RegisterTestFramework' 以註冊它

trans-unit.source: Determine the result of the test application execution
trans-unit.target: 判斷測試應用程式執行的結果

trans-unit.source: Test application result
trans-unit.target: 測試應用程式結果

trans-unit.source: VSTest mode only supports a single TestApplicationBuilder per process
trans-unit.target: VSTest 模式僅支援每一程序的單一 TestApplicationBuilder

trans-unit.source: Discovered {0} tests in {1} assemblies.
trans-unit.target: 在 {1} 組件中找到 {0} 個測試。
trans-unit.note: 0 is number of tests, 1 is count of assemblies

trans-unit.source: Discovered {0} tests.
trans-unit.target: 已找到 {0} 個測試。

trans-unit.source: Method '{0}' should not have been called on this proxy object
trans-unit.target: 不應在此 Proxy 物件上呼叫方法 '{0}'。

trans-unit.source: Test adapter test session failure
trans-unit.target: 測試配接器測試工作階段失敗

trans-unit.source: Test application process didn't exit gracefully, exit code is '{0}'
trans-unit.target: 測試應用程式流程未正常結束，結束代碼為 '{0}'

trans-unit.source: Test run summary:
trans-unit.target: 測試回合摘要：

trans-unit.source: Failed to acquire semaphore before timeout of '{0}' seconds
trans-unit.target: 無法在 '{0}' 秒逾時前取得旗號

trans-unit.source: Failed to flush logs before the timeout of '{0}' seconds
trans-unit.target: 無法在 '{0}' 秒逾時前排清記錄

trans-unit.source: Total
trans-unit.target: 總計

trans-unit.source: A filter '{0}' should not contain a '/' character
trans-unit.target: 篩選條件 '{0}' 不應包含 '/' 字元

trans-unit.source: Use a tree filter to filter down the tests to execute
trans-unit.target: 使用樹狀篩選來篩選要執行的測試

trans-unit.source: An escape character should not terminate the filter string '{0}'
trans-unit.target: 逸出字元不應終止篩選條件字串 '{0}'

trans-unit.source: Only the final filter path can contain '**' wildcard
trans-unit.target: 只有最終篩選條件路徑可以包含 '**' 萬用字元

trans-unit.source: Unexpected operator '&' or '|' within filter expression '{0}'
trans-unit.target: 篩選條件運算式 '{0}' 中出現未預期的運算子 '&' 或 '|'

trans-unit.source: Invalid node path, expected root as first character '{0}'
trans-unit.target: 無效節點路徑，應將根作為第一個字元 '{0}'

trans-unit.source: Filter expression '{0}' contains an unbalanced number of '{1}' '{2}' operators
trans-unit.target: 篩選條件運算式 '{0}' 包含數量不平衡的 '{1}' '{2}' 運算子

trans-unit.source: Filter contains an unexpected '/' operator inside a parenthesized expression
trans-unit.target: 篩選條件在小括號內的運算子中包含未預期的 '/' 運算子

trans-unit.source: Unexpected telemetry call, the telemetry is disabled.
trans-unit.target: 未預期的遙測呼叫，遙測已停用。

trans-unit.source: An unexpected exception occurred during byte conversion
trans-unit.target: 位元組轉換期間發生未預期的例外狀況

trans-unit.source: An unexpected exception occurred in 'FileLogger.WriteLogToFileAsync'. {0}
trans-unit.target: 'FileLogger.WriteLogToFileAsync' 發生未預期的例外狀況。 {0}

trans-unit.source: Unexpected state in file '{0}' at line '{1}'
trans-unit.target: 檔案 '{0}' 的第 '{1}' 行出現未預期的狀態

trans-unit.source: The communication protocol '{0}' is not supported
trans-unit.target: 通訊協定 '{0}' 不受支援

trans-unit.source: [ServerTestHost.OnTaskSchedulerUnobservedTaskException] Unhandled exception: {0}
trans-unit.target: [ServerTestHost.OnTaskSchedulerUnobservedTaskException] 未處理的例外狀況： {0}
trans-unit.note: {0} is the exception that was unhandled/unobserved

trans-unit.source: This program location is thought to be unreachable. File='{0}' Line={1}
trans-unit.target: 此程式位置被認為無法連線。File='{0}' Line={1}

trans-unit.source: Zero tests ran
trans-unit.target: 已執行零項測試
